Hero.title2: I build minimalist & modern web experiences.
Hero.description: Senior Full Stack Developer with extensive experience building scalable web ecosystems using Angular, React, Next.js, and Node.js. Focused on robust software architecture, performance optimization, and high-impact user experiences.

Skills.title: Skills & Expertise
Skills.description: A comprehensive list of technologies I use to build scalable and modern web applications.

descriptions.Frontend: Frameworks and libraries for interface development.

Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.description: A selection of my recent work including enterprise-grade applications and high-performance systems.

bwork.title: B-Work
bwork.description: Enterprise workspace management platform optimized for intelligent physical desk booking based on real-time availability, user profiles, and specific team technical requirements.

inversiones.title: App Investment
inversiones.description: High-fidelity financial dashboard for multi-currency liquidity and profitability monitoring. Implements complex data visualization and real-time investment projections.
awards: Futuristic design and advanced statistical data visualization.

tiquetera.title: Benefits Ticketing
tiquetera.description: Human Capital Management (HCM) system for automated corporate benefits administration. Features hierarchical approval workflows and request ticket traceability.
awards: Innovative application tailored for HR and employee needs.

comisiones.title: Commissions App
comisiones.description: Algorithmic calculation engine integrated with enterprise ERP for automated commission settlement. Leverages predictive logic based on compliance metrics and sales KPIs.
awards: Substantial improvement and efficiency in mass settlement processes.

precios.title: Price & Discount Update
precios.description: High-performance data processing tool for large-scale CSV catalog ingestion and synchronization. Optimizes price updates and discount structures using batch processing algorithms.
awards: Critical reduction in update times and loading process optimization.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern high-fidelity portfolio built with Next.js and Framer Motion. Features glassmorphism effects, infinite carousels, and multi-language support with a premium galaxy aesthetic.

Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to chat? Send me a message or connect on social media.

form.title: Contact Form
form.description: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
